DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess and compare the pharmacokinetic properties of YM178 in normal subjects and those with mild, moderate and severe renal impairment.
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study of YM178 in Normal Subjects and Those With Mild, Moderate, and Severe Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: good health other than renal impairment body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 40 kg/m2 subject with renal impairment has not been on stable dose of concomitant medication for at least 2 weeks subject has liver enzyme abnormalities
DOC.keyword: mild, moderate, and severe renal impaired subjects
Modification of Diet in Renal Disease (MDRD) formula
